title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be displayed even when dataset is not set
OB: The group dialog is not displayed when a table report item is added without setting the dataset. As a result, users are unable to define a group for the table.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed when a table report item is added without setting the dataset. Users should be able to define a group for the table, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR: Add a table report item without setting the dataset and try creating a new table group. The group dialog should be displayed, allowing the user to define the group even if the dataset is not set.
